summary.para: The DVD_SubpictureAttributes structure contains information about the DVD subpicture. The method fills in a DVD_SubpictureAttributes structure for a specified stream.
Variable of type that indicates whether the subpicture contains language-related content.
Variable of type that indicates how the subpicture graphics stream is encoded.
Variable of type LCID that identifies the subpicture language if Type equals DVD_SPType_Language.
Variable of type that identifies the subpicture language extension if Type equals DVD_SPType_Language.
